titles.title: Protecting Small Businesses From Costly Regulations Act of 2010
To prohibit, for one year, the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from issuing regulations that result in increased costs for small business concerns, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: Protecting Small Businesses From Costly Regulations Act of 2010 - Prohibits the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), during the one-year period after the enactment of this Act, from issuing a regulation that would result in increased costs for a small business, unless the regulation is in response to a major disaster, necessary to prevent a major disaster, or necessary to protect human life.
